title: Delete Your Ahau Profile
undone: This will delete your Ahau database from your computer.
notBackedUp: If you have not backed up your keys this cannot be undone and all of your personal records will be lost.
continue: Are you sure you want to continue?
removeProfile: Delete my database and remove my profile from all records.
keepProfileVisible: Delete my database and keep my profile visble in records.
confirmDeletePrompt: If you would like to continue, please type the following phrase
deletePhrase: Yes, I would like to delete Ahau
